poem:
Title: On the Edges of Integrity

The abrasive script of power's game,
Bites at the man who dares the same.
In tortured garb of truth stood Neal,
His weapon, voice of tempered steel.
The borders cry with silent screams,
Echoes edge on shattered dreams.
Inspectorates hold their breath,
Ever on the precipice of death,
Yet in his honest word's final hour,
Leaves steadfast in truth's lonely bower.
